Who was the first player inducted into t.question: Who was the first player inducted into the Major League Baseball Hall of Fame in 1936?
Who was the first player inducted into t.sql:
SELECT nameFirst, nameLast
FROM halloffame
JOIN people on halloffame.playerID = people.playerID
WHERE yearID = 1936 AND inducted = 'Y'
ORDER BY yearID
LIMIT 1;

Who was the first player to be unanimous.question: Who was the first player to be unanimously inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame?
Who was the first player to be unanimous.sql:
SELECT nameFirst, nameLast
FROM halloffame
JOIN people ON halloffame.playerID = people.playerID
WHERE ballots = votes AND inducted = 'Y'
ORDER BY yearID
LIMIT 1;

Who was the first unanimous selection fo.question: Who was the first unanimous selection for the Baseball Hall of Fame in 2019?
Who was the first unanimous selection fo.sql:
SELECT playerID 
FROM halloffame 
WHERE yearID=2019 AND votes=ballots AND inducted='Y'
LIMIT 1;

Who was the first player inducted into t.question: Who was the first player inducted into the National Baseball Hall of Fame?
Who was the first player inducted into t.sql:
SELECT nameFirst, nameLast
FROM halloffame 
JOIN people ON halloffame.playerID = people.playerID
WHERE inducted = 'Y'
ORDER BY yearID ASC
LIMIT 1;

Who was the first unanimous selection to.question: Who was the first unanimous selection to the Baseball Hall of Fame in 2019?
Who was the first unanimous selection to.sql:
SELECT nameFirst, nameLast
FROM halloffame
JOIN people ON halloffame.playerID = people.playerID
WHERE yearID = 2019 AND votes = ballots
ORDER BY votes DESC
LIMIT 1;

Who was the first unanimous inductee int.question: Who was the first unanimous inductee into the Baseball Hall of Fame in 2019?
Who was the first unanimous inductee int.sql:
SELECT nameFirst, nameLast
FROM halloffame
JOIN people ON halloffame.playerID = people.playerID
WHERE yearID = 2019 AND inducted = 'Y' AND votes = ballots
LIMIT 1;

What is the name of the player who hit t.question: What is the name of the player who hit the most career home runs in Major League Baseball history?
What is the name of the player who hit t.sql:
SELECT
    CONCAT(p.nameFirst, ' ', p.nameLast) AS player_name
FROM
    people p
JOIN
    batting b ON p.playerID = b.playerID
WHERE
    b.b_HR = (
        SELECT
            MAX(b_HR)
        FROM
            batting
    )

Who was the first player to hit 200 home.question: Who was the first player to hit 200 home runs for the New York Yankees?
Who was the first player to hit 200 home.sql:
SELECT p.nameFirst, p.nameLast
FROM batting b
JOIN people p ON b.playerID = p.playerID
WHERE b.teamID = 'NYA'
GROUP BY b.playerID
HAVING SUM(b.b_HR) >= 200
ORDER BY MIN(b.yearID)
LIMIT 1;

Which team won the World Series in 2020?.question: Which team won the World Series in 2020?
Which team won the World Series in 2020?.sql:
SELECT team_name 
FROM teams 
WHERE yearID = 2020 
AND WSWin = 'Y';

Which player has the most career home ru.question: Which player has the most career home runs in Major League Baseball history?
Which player has the most career home ru.sql:
SELECT
    p.nameFirst,
    p.nameLast,
    b.b_HR
FROM
    batting b
JOIN
    people p ON b.playerID = p.playerID
WHERE
    b.b_HR = (SELECT 
                MAX(b_HR) 
              FROM 
                batting);

Who holds the record for the most career.question: Who holds the record for the most career home runs in Major League Baseball history?
Who holds the record for the most career.sql:
SELECT people.nameFirst, people.nameLast
FROM people
JOIN batting ON people.playerID = batting.playerID
GROUP BY people.playerID
ORDER BY SUM(batting.b_HR) DESC
LIMIT 1;

Who was the first player to hit 500 care.question: Who was the first player to hit 500 career home runs in Major League Baseball?
Who was the first player to hit 500 care.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT p.nameFirst, p.nameLast
FROM people p
JOIN halloffame h ON p.playerID = h.playerID
WHERE h.category = 'Player' AND h.inducted = 'Y'
ORDER BY h.yearID
LIMIT 1;

Who was the first player to hit 60 home.question: Who was the first player to hit 60 home runs in a single MLB season?
Who was the first player to hit 60 home.sql:
SELECT p.nameFirst, p.nameLast
FROM batting AS b
JOIN people AS p ON b.playerID = p.playerID
WHERE b.b_HR = 60
ORDER BY b.yearID
LIMIT 1;

Which player hit the most home runs in t.question: Which player hit the most home runs in the history of Major League Baseball?
Which player hit the most home runs in t.sql:
SELECT people.nameFirst, people.nameLast
FROM people
JOIN batting ON people.playerID = batting.playerID
WHERE batting.b_HR = (SELECT MAX(b_HR) FROM batting)

Who was the first player to hit four hom.question: Who was the first player to hit four home runs in a single game in Major League Baseball history?
Who was the first player to hit four hom.sql:
SELECT nameFirst, nameLast
FROM people
JOIN batting ON people.playerID = batting.playerID
WHERE b_HR = 4
ORDER BY yearId
LIMIT 1;

Who was the first player to pitch a perf.question: Who was the first player to pitch a perfect game in the World Series?
Who was the first player to pitch a perf.sql:
SELECT nameFirst, nameLast 
FROM people 
WHERE playerID = (
    SELECT playerID 
    FROM pitching 
    WHERE p_SHO = 1 
    ORDER BY yearID 
    LIMIT 1
)

Which team won the first World Series in.question: Which team won the first World Series in 1903?
Which team won the first World Series in.sql:
SELECT teams.team_name
FROM teams
WHERE teams.yearID = 1903 AND teams.WSWin = 'Y'
